about.title: About Me
about.description: Passionate about computing and development — it's both my job and one of my hobbies. I enjoy turning complex problems into elegant solutions, whether that's debugging a segfault at line 459 of a personal project or architecting a production-grade internal tool. Outside of code I fly drones, play piano, build things with a 3D printer and lose myself in video games.

foodMatchPrivacy.title: FoodMatch
foodMatchPrivacy.subtitle: Privacy Policy
foodMatchPrivacy.overview_p: FoodMatch is a personal meal-planning utility. It helps you track food restrictions, allergies, and dietary preferences for people in your life, and scan food product barcodes to check ingredient compatibility.
foodMatchPrivacy.overview_highlight: FoodMatch does not collect, transmit, or share any personal data. All information you enter stays exclusively on your device.
foodMatchPrivacy.storage_p: All data created within FoodMatch — including people's names and their food restrictions — is stored locally on your device using the device's own secure storage (AsyncStorage). This data is:
foodMatchPrivacy.storage_li3: Permanently deleted when you uninstall the app.
foodMatchPrivacy.camera_p: FoodMatch requests access to your camera solely to scan food product barcodes. Camera frames are processed entirely on-device and are never stored or transmitted.
foodMatchPrivacy.network_p: When you scan a barcode, FoodMatch queries the Open Food Facts public API to retrieve ingredient and allergen information for that product.
foodMatchPrivacy.network_li1: Only the barcode number is sent to Open Food Facts.
foodMatchPrivacy.network_li2: No personal information, names, or restriction profiles are ever transmitted.
foodMatchPrivacy.network_li3: Barcode lookups are subject to the Open Food Facts Privacy Policy.
foodMatchPrivacy.network_cache: Product data retrieved from Open Food Facts is cached locally on your device to reduce repeat network requests.
foodMatchPrivacy.analytics_p: FoodMatch contains no analytics, no advertising, and no tracking of any kind. No SDKs for these purposes are included in the app.
foodMatchPrivacy.children_p: FoodMatch does not collect any data from any users, including children under the age of 13. The app is safe for use by all age groups.
foodMatchPrivacy.changes_p: If this privacy policy is updated, the new version will be published at this URL and the "Last updated" date above will be revised. Material changes will also be noted in the app store release notes.
